toXML

public java.lang.String toXML()
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                              org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
generate XML from the doc. This always triggers a recalculate of everything, then the attribute is saved. We do it this way because we don't know what has changed underneath.

Specified by:
toXML in interface XmlNode
Returns:
XML of the tree
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - In case of network/rmi error
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - For smartfrog problems, and for caught XMLExceptions

validate

public void validate()
              throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                     java.rmi.RemoteException
Validate the XML, post-generation. Default implementation checks the valid attribute and fails if it is false.

Specified by:
validate in interface XmlNode
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - In case of network/rmi error
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - For smartfrog problems, and for caught XMLExceptions
